questions.text:
Consider the following JavaScript code embedded in an HTML document. What will be the output on the console?
console.log(a); var a = 10; console.log(a);
questions.subject: mad2

questions.text: Which of the following statements is false about JavaScript hoisting?

options.A: Function declarations are hoisted with their definitions.
options.B: Variables declared with let and const are hoisted but not initialized.
options.C: var declarations are hoisted and initialized to undefined.

questions.subject: mad2

questions.text:
Consider the following JavaScript code. What will be the output?
function outer(){ let x=5; function inner(){ console.log(x);} x=10; return inner;} const closure = outer(); closure();
